description: Make seafood the star of your snacking with these simple fried tiger prawns, served with crunchy lettuce and a soy dipping sauce.
name: Easy Fried Prawns With Dipping Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g green Australian tiger prawns, peeled and deveined with heads and tails intact
2 heads baby cos lettuce, leaves separated

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook prawns in two batches, for 1 minute each side. Set aside for serving.
To make the dipping sauce, combine vinegar, soy and chilli flakes in a small bowl.
Place lettuce leaves on a serving platter. Top with prawns. Drizzle half of the dressing over the prawns. Serve remaining dressing alongside.
